name: OSOYOO Ultrasonic Levitation Kit, Soldering Practice Project to Learn to Solder and Master STEM Skills with USB power cable

The instructions before purchased: If you have soldering experience, this kit is very easy. However, if you are a novice, be aware that the components in this kit are quite small, making the operation a bit challenging. You can consider it as a soldering "practice" kit, it comes with a detailed PDF guide. the circuit board is labeled with component names, making it easy to locate their positions, and we advise a small point iron a magnifier and a good set of tweezers. name: Focket DIY Acoustic Levitation, Ultrasonic Suspension Kit Electronic Production Learning Levitator Soldering Standing for Student (Focketvms2ue5f6d)
short_description: 【WORKING PRINCIPLE】The DIY ultrasonic suspension module is the distance between the transmission and reflex waves through the distance between the ultrasonic transmission end and the reflection end, forming the effect of the suspension, and eventually achieve the effect of suspension.

【FUN IN LEARNING】The DIY acoustic levitation electronics making kit is suitable for DIY electronics and can also be used as a school education practice kit, the welding practice kit is both fun and can practice hands on ability, you will also become more familiar with electronic components and understand ultrasonic levitation and standing waves.

【SIMPLE WORKING】The device consists of a PCB circuit board and components, and also includes a set of foam balls. No complex programming required, just basic soldering, check all accessories before assembling the kit, and marking the location of the components on the board for easy assembly.

【IDEAL FOR CLASS】This is a mini ultrasonic levitator module that can suspend foam balls. With the ultrasonic probe, it can still be suspended when lying down, and can be suspended for a long time, which is stable for 24 hours. Mainly used for students or DIY enthusiasts to learn about ultrasonic standing suspension.
